name: SEMI-CLASSICAL INDIAN
data: GATES 2019 presents the Indian Semi-Classical Solo Singing Competition, where those blessed with a "Surili" voice will compete. Shortlisting for the finale round will be done on the basis of the entries received. Participants can select songs from any genre and will be judged on the basis of tempo, melody, taan and song selection

name: WESTERN VOCAL
data: GATES 2019 presents the Western Solo Singing Competition, where those gifted can showcase their melodious voice to make their mark! Shortlisting for the finale round will be done on the basis of the entries received. Participants can select songs from any genre and will be judged on the basis of tempo, melody and song selection.

name: BATTLE OF BANDS
data: Rock music is for the hurt, the broken and anybody else that can handle it. The loud mouth, the screaming, the head banging and the mass venting is back. The supreme battle for the rock warriors, where music has a whole new definition is here. Let us celebrate music with the ultimate rock band carnage. GATES'19 invites entries for the Rock Band Competition �Battle Of Bands�.

name: FOOTLOOSE (SOLO WESTERN DANCE)
data:
Round 1: Online video preliminary
The interested participants from various colleges will provide us with their video of this year's production of 2-4 minutes. The selected participants will be participating in the next round.
Round 2: Main competition
The selected participants will be performing in GATES'19. The performances will be of 3-4 mins. The performance will be judged on the basis of criterion decided by the judge.

name: FOOTLOOSE (GROUP WESTERN DANCE)
data:
Round 1: Online video preliminary
The interested teams from various colleges will provide us with the videos of this year's production. The videos will be judged and selected. The selected teams will participate in the next round.
Round 2: Main Competition
The selected teams will be performing in GATES'19. The performances will be of 7-10 mins .The performance will be judged on the basis of criterion decided by the judge.
Team Size-6-25 members

name: KRANTI (STREET PLAY)
data: Different teams of Theatre Circuit will participate and will be performing their street-plays on various social topics to aware people.

name: KALAKAR (MONO-ACTING)
data:
Different Individuals will showcase their acting talent.
Monoacting requires closed indoors conditions with silence for actors to prepare and perform at their best with negligible disturbance.

name: BHANGRA RELAY
data: A relay race with bhangra touch is as innovative as our choreographies are. One would have never participated in such an event before. Teams with 4 members each will be competing where each member will be given a specific task related to bhangra. You need not essentially have any prior experience of bhangra. Just register your teams and be there on the event day.

name: SOLO DANCE
data: In this competition, one can perform any dance form. While registering yourself,just specify the dance form and you are good to go. Rules and regulations for this event are available on the registration forms

name: FOLK DANCE
data: Traditional folk dance competition where only groups of 6-14 members can participate(excluding accompanists). Any Indian folk dance is allowed but no mixing up of two or more forms will be allowed. Register your teams. Rules and regulations for this event are available on the registration forms.

name: ONE-ON-ONE BHANGRA BATTLE
data: A one on one bhangra battle where 2 participants will be given the stage for 1 minute simultaneously. The songs will not be provided to you beforehand so it has to be an on the spot performance. One should have at least beginners level skills in order to participate. The results will be decided by the loudness of the crowd�s hooting. We will use reliable devices to measure the loudness. Register for details.

name: STROKE 'N FILL(PAINTING COMPETITION)
data: An On The Spot Painting Competition in which the participants will be given a topic and have to paint that in the given time duration.

name: WILD SIDE (GRAFFITI)
data: The word Graffiti originates from Greek graphein�meaning "to write". Wild Side is a Graffiti competition in which the participants will be given a theme and have to fill a given piece of wall with their imagination.

name: DOODLE (CARTOONING)
data:
Cartooning is done for entertainment, political commentary, or advertising.
Doodle is a Cartooning competition in which the participants have to draw a cartoon based on a given theme.

name: SCULP-IT (CLAY MODELLING)
data: Sculp-It' is a clay modelling competition in which the participants have to create a clay model on a given theme.
